thread.title: BRIEF-United States Steel Says CFO Kevin Bradley Reports Open Market Purchase Of 20,000 Common Shares

title: BRIEF-United States Steel Says CFO Kevin Bradley Reports Open Market Purchase Of 20,000 Common Shares

organizations.name: brief-united states steel says cfo kevin bradley reports ope

text: March 16, 2018 / 8:15 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-United States Steel Says CFO Kevin Bradley Reports Open Market Purchase Of 20,000 Common Shares Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 16 (Reuters) - United States Steel Corp: * UNITED STATES STEEL SAYS CFO KEVIN BRADLEY REPORTS OPEN MARKET PURCHASE OF 20,000 COMMON SHARES AT AVERAGE PRICE OF $40PER SHARE ON MARCH 14 - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2It6Lpo ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
